content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Greetings, Emilia Müller. While I appreciate your interest in the apartment in Magdeburg, let's focus solely on the rental price discussion for now. To begin negotiations, I propose a starting price of 1200 Euros per month.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for sharing the initial rental price offer. After considering my financial situation and desiring to keep expenses minimal while maintaining a high standard of living, I would like to propose countering with a rental price of 950 Euros per month.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because your proposed rental price significantly undervalues the property and would not align with my objectives. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
